title: The Durango Daredevil strikes again: bullying

description: Shows the negative result of intimidation and the undesirability of such actions. Shows how Butch Bear dresses up like his hero, the Durango Daredevil, and terrorises his puppet friends because they won't let him play piano in the school concert. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
